accommodation-card.approve_title: Are you sure you want to approve this accommodation?
accommodation-card.approve_subtitle: If you choose "Approve", the accommodation will be published.
accommodation-card.reject_title: Are you sure you want to reject this accommodation?
accommodation-card.reject_subtitle: If you choose "Reject", the accommodation will be hidden. The owner will be able to edit it and submit it for approval at a later time.

create.availability_info: Set the availability periods for your accommodation. Note: the end date's night is not included in the period.
create.unavailability_info: If it is more convenient, you can add unavailability periods too. For example, if your accommodation will be available for six months with the exception of a few weekends, you can set a six months availability period and add unavailability periods for those weekends. Note: the end date's night is not included in the period.
create.availability_overlaps: Error: availability overlaps with existing availabilities
create.availability_reversed_dates: Error: start date must be before end date
create.unavailability_overlaps: Error: unavailability overlaps with existing unavailabilities
create.title: Title
create.photos_instructions: The first photo will be used as the main photo of this accommodation. At least one photo is required. You can upload up to 10 photos. Files must not exceed 7 MB.
create.payload_too_large: Error: maximum allowed size (7 MB) exceeded for file
create.too_many_photos: Error: maximum allowed number of photos (10) exceeded
create.required_photo: At least one photo is required
create.missing_required: One or more required fields haven't been filled
create.modal_subtitle: By clicking 'Confirm', this accommodation will be created and sent to the admin for approval.
